import '../css/style.scss'; import Service00 from '../../../shared/images/service00.png'; import Service01 from '../../../shared/images/service01.jpg'; import Service02 from '../../../shared/images/service02.jpg'; import ButtonArrow from '../../../shared/images/button-arrow.png'; const Service = () => { return (

How It Works?

ELYFI Protocol allows the creation of fungible assets, “synthetics”, that track the price of real world assets.
ELYFI synthetics are intended to be used as key building blocks in smart contracts,
and to bring the world’s assets to the blockchain.

For Participants

Decentralized Applications

Demand driven peer-to-peer lending markets using real estate
tokens as collateral will be the next step for personal finance

Coming soon

For Buyers

Real estate investing at your fingertips

Find real estate opportunities around the world and
settle transactions with almost no intermediary costs

{ window.location.replace("https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=land.elysia") }}> Download the app

For Participants

Decentralized Applications

Demand driven peer-to-peer lending markets using real estate
tokens as collateral will be the next step for personal finance

Coming soon

); } export default Service;
